I don't often write reviews, but I just had to. This shirt is perfect! The material is wonderful! It is soft and it drapes nicely. I could even dress it up and wear it to go out and it's perfect for the gym. It is slightly sheer but not see through (which I actually wanted to show off my sports bra a little). It is well made and it shapes the body just perfectly. I generally buy a small or a medium depending on how I want the shirt to fit. I'm a 34D and I bought a medium and it does fit a little big on the armpit sides. I won't be returning this one but when I purchase again (which I certainly will) I will probably select a small. If you're thinking about it, just buy it, you won't regret it.

I love these shirts! I have bought them in over 6 different colors and absolutely love the fit. I wear them to the gym every morning and the soft fabric is comfortable without being too clingy. They also allow free range of motion which is great for me when lifting weights. They have held up great through many washes.

Surprisingly more support than I expected. My only gripe, and it isn’t big enough to be a deal breaker, I wish the material was stitched up to the bra a little more under the arm so it wouldn’t droop AS much. But really, it fits true to size, comfortable, and supportive.
True to size. sheer, but I don't mind it. I accidentally ordered an XS, but I like the style. It's really nice for hot weather and it's nice as a travel clothing staple.

评论概述: 🤣  this is the thinnest "opaque" shirt I have ever bought and that is saying a lot!
评论详情: I understand this is supposed to be an exercise shirt, which would imply it is breathable and it is because it's THIN AS FARK... but ... it's not made of active wear material (the black one is 70% modal, 30% polyester) which makes it look and feel incredibly cheap.  I did buy it with the intent of using it as a workout top so it shouldn't matter so much that the coverage is poor, I really just don't like feeling like I'm being taken advantage of when it comes to price and quality. At the time of purchase, this shirt is being sold for $20 and it is honestly worth $10 (even with inflation and all those shenanigans). This shirt does not spark joy.  As far as the fit, it does seem to run on the smaller side (this is not a problem I usually have-- I do try lots of clothes-- so I'm assuming it is the shirt and not me gaining weight). It is not cut in a flattering way-- i.e. the back fits well like if I bought the next size up then the back opening would look large and awkward-- but there is no flow or movement in the front of this shirt. If you are bloated in any way it will show.

These bras need to be sized up by one. Other than that though, great quality, very comfortable. The one I ordered has held up great over time. Still looks like new. Didn't shrink in the wash. Very good quality bra, just pay closer attention to the sizing than I did.
This is my favorite tank top in the summer heat. Yard work, lake days, workouts; good for all things and super cute! Material is not stretchy but flowy.
So lightweight and cute. I love it!
Very soft and comfortable but order a siz down from what you usually wear
I wore this tank while camping and loved loved loved them. I got them in all colors! I’m 5’6 135 lbs and bought a Small

I loved the fit and style of this shirt. I have worn it twice for my walk/runs. However, I noticed a really weird smell straight out of the package. I washed it and it seemed to go away. I aired dried it and it seemed to take forever to dry. Not a good sign for a workout shirt. Also both times I wore it and I got sweaty, that really strange smell came back. I know it’s not me because none of my other clothes smell this way. Whenever it gets wet it stinks really bad. Thinking of getting rid of it or just not using it to work out in. Very disappointing as it’s a pretty shirt.

This top is great for working out at the gym.  I bought it a size larger than my actual size so that when I sweat it does not cling to my body and will let air circulate around my body/skin in order to cool off more quickly.

Super cute, love the way it fits. But you can’t wear it for very long because anything and everything will leave a mark on it and it does not come off in the washer. It’s just ok. Material isn’t what I expected, which is my bad for not reading the description of what it was made of. This is really pretty!  I love the color, I love the criss cross strappiness.  I love how the band at the bottom doesn't roll or fold up when you bend over.  It's super super comfortable.  Looks great, feels great, what's not to love?

it's hard to find anything quality under $30 these days but I DO enjoy this tank, i ordered a black medium =, I'm 5'5", about 160 right now (just had a baby) and I wanted a tank top that was lightweight, flattering and breastfeeding friendly..this is that tank top..the tank top I received is not a v neck and doesn't come as low in the back as the ones pictured..they're both "scoop" and show way less than the photos advertised.. I'm not upset about this since it's a $22 amazon tank top..it's not as stretchy or soft as I would like but I can still pull it down enough to breastfeed and it is a great tank to workout in

I bought 2.  The red is a medium.  The blue is XS.  I bought it for my daughter but it was too big on her, so I kept it.  Maybe my next one will be a small.  🙂They both fit nicely, depending on whether I want it loose and flowy, or more fitted.  I am 5’10”, 135 lbs.  the top is soft, and well made.  I actually do intend to get one more.  If they had more colors I liked, I would probably get more than that.  I might use it as a work out too, but I really like it with jeans too.My only complaint (besides not enough color variety) is that the straps are kind of close together in the front, as if it were made for someone with narrow shoulders (why I thought it might work for my very lean 14 year old).  Most straps land over my bra straps.  Hard to tell in the photos, but thee straps are nearly an inch in.Still a great top.  Recommend.

The criss cross straps on this sports bra make it a cute under layer for backless tops. It fits true to size and is good quality fabric.
Thinner than expected. Shorter than expected.

评论概述: Very comfortable and fits as expected.
评论详情: My wife is not a huge fan of sports bras but she likes this one. She says it's very comfortable and fits nicely. It will be nice when going out to a park or fair or similar. Worth the price.

I ordered this sports bra in a size XL.  For reference, I am 5'6", 185 lbs, 38DD and a size large top.  I felt that this sports bra fits a little funny - it fits great around the band, but the space that holds the girls is a bit small, and they come flopping out of the side of the sports bra. Thankfully I just wear this around my house and not to work out in, because it certainly wouldn't work for an intense workout.
I paired this tank with an accent bra, it's super soft, a but in the thinner side, but not see-through! Very comfy, i wouldn't necessarily use it for working out though.
I ordered a small bc I’m small chested, but I have a pretty wide rib cage so a little snug around that area.

评论概述: Most comfortable and now new favorite bra
评论详情: This is the best bra I have ever had.  The material is  thick yet soft and sooo comfy.  I wear about an A and this would fit any size.  Feels like I have nothing on but holds so well.  You won’t regret it
The fabric is soft, the style is beautiful but unfortunately it's way too tight around the rib area but way too loose up top and extremely stretchy. It fits very awkwardly so I wouldn't recommend it.

I really wanted to like this bra. I followed the size chart and got a size XL, and it was so tight that I could barely get it on. It isn't very stretchy, which is awesome for a sports bra because it gives tons of support, but that combined with it being small to begin with means it isn't a good fit for me. The color is lovely!  Bottom line: Not quite for me.

Cute sports bra, and I love the back. I've found myself wearing sports bras more & more frequently & noticed this one does seem to have a bit less stretch than I've become used to. That's not a huge issue, but I don't love it when I'm taking it off. Initially I thought it was a little snug for a small but I think the lack of stretch (particularly of the bottom/base band) is what contributes to that & overall it's pretty true to size. I washed on gentle & hung to dry, no issues!
These tanks fit great! I've purchased a few now and would def purchase more. Love the low back. Great to show off a cute sports bra.

This bra has fun little straps that help it be more than a boring old sports bra.  Sometimes when you have lots of straps that are delicate you loose the support but I didn't feel that way with this bra.  I ordered a large as didn't want it super tight around my chest.  This is typically the size I order in sports bras and seemed like a good fit for me.  I'm a taller athletic built gal not terribly busty.  This bra does have removable pads.  I have worn and washed it several times and I am still pleased with the bra.
Really nice, comfortable, true to size stretchy bra. The band does not roll up and I really enjoy wearing this one.

Such a great sports bra! It’s super cute and has great support! It’s a perfect solution to shorts that have an open back. You can wear a good, comfortable and supportive sports bra and not have a tacky look of bra straps showing. Instead it enhances the look for shorts with open backs, absolutely love this!!!

评论概述: thick and holds you in place
评论详情: This is a review for LEXISLOVE Strappy Sports Bras for Women Criss Cross Back MediumVery nice quality.  Thick and holds things in place well.  I love the criss cross pattern on the back.  Also has an opening for inserts so you can remove them if you don't care for the padding.  I will definitely order one for my daughter.

I wear a 34B/C and I measured my bust with a measuring tape and it showed me to order a large.  But the large is too big on me. It's a cute bra and the material feels nice and soft. I think I will see about swapping it out for a medium and use it for lounge wear.

I am about 5'4 and 130lbs, I ordered this in a large. I typically order large in sports bras because I do not like anything feeling too tight. This fit exactly how I hoped it would, not too tight and not too loose. The pale pink color is beautiful, and I love the design of the straps on the back. The material is 75% nylon and 25% spandex, it is very soft and super comfortable. The padding is not too thin as some sports bras tend to be but actually have some cushion to them. Overall, I am very pleased with my order, I am sure to order more!

I wasn't sure whether to size up to a medium or not. I probably could have but the small still fits, it's just tighter than I would prefer. Tolerable, very good for dancing, but not a bra I'd lounge in all day. Size up if you want to lounge. I'm a 32C/30D~ish.

This is soft and comfortable which is why I gave it 2 and not 1 star. It is NOT a sports bra. There is absolutely no support so working out with any jumping will have your girls moving all over the place. I am a B cup so don't need a ton of support but this doesn't give me any. I will wear it as a regular bra and stick to real sports bras when I am working out.

This sports bra fits well around the ribs, back and shoulders. Some are made really tight around the ribs. The band around the ribs is a smooth material which feels comfortable. I really like the back, which is great with a key-hole backed tank. For me, the cup part is a little loose, but I’m quite small there and you can’t tell once a shirt is on top. I wear a size small and really like this bra.
